name: I: Unsorted
description: Place to drop unsorted loot.  You can use "sort out loot" zone-action to sort items inside.  It can overlap with Loot zones of different types.

name: I: Food
description: Destination for comestibles.  If more specific food zone is not defined, all food is moved here.

name: I: Perishable Food
description: Destination for perishable comestibles.  Does include perishable drinks if such zone is not specified.

name: I: Drink
description: Destination for drinks.  Does include perishable drinks if such zone is not specified.

name: I: Perishable Drink
description: Destination for perishable drinks.

name: I: Containers
description: Destination for empty containers.

name: I: Guns
description: Destination for guns, bows and similar weapons.

name: I: Magazines
description: Destination for gun magazines.

name: I: Ammo
description: Destination for ammo.

name: I: Weapons
description: Destination for melee weapons.

name: I: Tools
description: Destination for tools.

name: I: Clothing
description: Destination for clothing.  Does include filthy clothing if such zone is not specified.

name: I: Filthy Clothing
description: Destination for filthy clothing.

name: I: Drugs
description: Destination for drugs and other medical items.

name: I: Books
description: Destination for books and magazines.

name: I: Manuals
description: Destination for instructional books and magazines.

name: I: Mods
description: Destination for firearm modifications and similar items.

name: I: Mutagens
description: Destination for mutagens, serums, and purifiers.

name: I: Bionics
description: Destination for Compact Bionics Modules, a.k.a. CBMs.

name: I: Vehicle Parts
description: Destination for vehicle parts.

name: I: Other
description: Destination for other miscellaneous items.

name: I: Maps
description: Destination for maps.

name: I: Keys
description: Destination for keys.

name: I: Currency
description: Destination for currency.

name: I: Fuel
description: Destination for gasoline, diesel, kerosene and other substances used as a fuel.

name: I: Seeds
description: Destination for seeds, stems and similar items.

name: I: Chemical
description: Destination for chemicals.

name: I: Spare Parts
description: Destination for spare parts.

name: I: Artifacts
description: Destination for artifacts.

name: I: Corpses
description: Destination for corpses.

name: I: Armor
description: Destination for armor.  Does include filthy armor if such zone is not specified.

name: I: Filthy Armor
description: Destination for filthy armor.

name: I: Wood
description: Destination for firewood and items that can be used as such.

name: I: Custom
description: Destination for loot with a custom filter that you can modify.

name: I: Ignore
description: Items inside of this zone are ignored by "sort out loot" zone-action.

name: I: Ignore Favorites
description: Favorite items inside of this zone are ignored by "sort out loot" zone-action.

name: I: Item Group
description: Destination for items from an item group.

name: No Auto Pickup
description: You won't auto-pickup items inside the zone.

name: No NPC Pickup
description: Friendly NPCs don't pickup items inside the zone.

name: NPC Retreat
description: When fleeing, friendly NPCs will attempt to retreat toward this zone if it is within 60 tiles.

name: NPC Ignore Sounds
description: Friendly NPCs won't investigate unseen sounds coming from this zone.

name: NPC Investigation Area
description: Friendly NPCs will investigate unseen sounds only if they come from inside this area.

name: Disassembly Work
description: Items in this zone are marked for disassembly

name: I: Strip Corpses
description: Corpses in this zone you don't otherwise sort will have everything taken off them and dropped on the same tile.

name: Start Point
description: A prioritized spawn point.

name: I: Unload Everything
description: Any containers in this zone you don't otherwise sort will have their contents dumped out and placed on the same tile.  This includes corpses, magazines, and magazine wells.
